tool_description: Easily perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations on any GitHub repository.

api_list.name: List folder contents
api_list.description: Lists all of the contents of a specific GitHub repository.

optional_parameters.name: repo
optional_parameters.description: The GitHub repository in the format 'owner/repo'.

optional_parameters.name: path
optional_parameters.description: The path within the repository to list contents from.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: The GitHub API key for authentication.
